questions.question: What is the FAQ Center?
questions.answer: The FAQ Center is a dedicated space where you can find answers to frequently asked questions.

questions.question: How can I contact support?
questions.answer: You can contact support via email at support@example.com.

questions.question: What payment methods are accepted?
questions.answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

questions.question: What are the shipping options?
questions.answer: We offer standard and express shipping options.

questions.question: What is the return policy?
questions.answer: You can return items within 30 days of purchase for a full refund.

questions.question: What is the privacy policy?
questions.answer: Your privacy is important to us. Please read our privacy policy for details.

questions.question: What are the terms of service?
questions.answer: By using our service, you agree to our terms of service. Please review them carefully.

questions.question: How do I manage my account?
questions.answer: You can manage your account settings by visiting the account management page.

questions.question: How is my data secured?
questions.answer: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data.

questions.question: How can I provide feedback?
questions.answer: We welcome your feedback! You can send us your thoughts via the feedback form on our website.
